title: Senior Backend Engineer
summary: Highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer with 7+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable and robust microservices. Proficient in Python, Java, and Go, with extensive expertise in cloud platforms (AWS), containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and modern API development. Passionate about building high-performance systems and leading technical initiatives.

cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, SQS, SNS, EKS)

description: Led the design and implementation of a new microservices architecture using Go and Kafka, improving system scalability by 40% and reducing latency by 25%.
Developed and maintained critical API endpoints for customer-facing applications, handling high traffic loads and ensuring data consistency.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices for clean code, testing, and distributed system design.
Managed deployment pipelines using Kubernetes and AWS EKS, optimizing resource utilization and reducing infrastructure costs by 15%.
Developed and optimized data processing pipelines using Python and Django, handling large datasets for analytics and reporting features.
Contributed to the migration of legacy monolithic applications to a more modular service-oriented architecture.
Implemented robust unit and integration tests, increasing code coverage to over 85% and reducing production bugs.
Collaborated with front-end teams to integrate new features and ensure seamless user experiences.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
